annotations.description: On this episode of Chaser, I am taking another look at Eggnog. Last time I made Eggnog, I made it with bourbon and Maraschino liqueur, and I loved it. This y...
annotations.title: Eggnog | Chaser

textContent:
Morganthaler's Eggnog Ingredients:
- 1 oz or 30 ml Cognac
- 1 oz or 30 ml Spiced Rum 
- 1 Large Egg
- 1.5 oz or 90 ml Sugar
- 2 oz or 60 ml Heavy Cream
- 3 oz or 90 ml Whole Milk
- Nutmeg Garnish

Blend egg in a blender, add sugar and blend for 1 minute, blend in rest of ingredients and pour. 

---

Baltimore Eggnog Ingredients: 
- 2 oz or 60 ml Cognac
- 1 oz or 30 ml Rum
- 3 oz or 90 ml Whole Milk
- .5 oz or 15 ml Simple Syrup
- 1 Whole Egg
- Shake and Top with Fresh Nutmeg

Dry shake and pour. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rg34xYHHCx8

---

2oz Bourbon
.5oz Cognac
.5oz Maraschino
.5oz Simple syrup
1 Whole egg

Dry shake
Ice shake
Top with Milk
Garnish with grated nutmeg and grated lemon peel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYqXJWOZybY

---

.75oz Jamaican Rum
.75oz Bourbon
1oz Heavy Cream
.5oz Simple Syrup
dash Cinnamon
dash Nutmeg
One whole Egg

Dry shake
Shake with a little amount of ice
Garnish with grated nutmeg and cinnamon

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kHq-nVZFBjg
title: Eggnog
